item.text: King Hiram of Tyre sent messengers to David, along with cedar logs, stonemasons, and carpenters to build a palace for him.
David realized that the Lord had established him as king over Israel and that he had elevated his kingdom for the sake of his people Israel.
In Jerusalem David married more wives and fathered more sons and daughters.

<st data-num="0428" class="">These</st> are the <st data-num="08034" class="">names</st> of <st data-num="03205 0834 01961">children born</st> to him in <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st>: <st data-num="08051" class="">Shammua</st>, <st data-num="07727" class="">Shobab</st>, <st data-num="05416" class="">Nathan</st>, <st data-num="08010" class="">Solomon</st>,
<st data-num="02984" class="">Ibhar</st>, <st data-num="0474" class="">Elishua</st>, <st data-num="0467" class="">Elpelet</st>,
<st data-num="05052" class="">Nogah</st>, <st data-num="05298" class="">Nepheg</st>, <st data-num="03309" class="">Japhia</st>,
Elishama, Beeliada, and Eliphelet.
When the Philistines heard that David had been anointed king of all Israel, all the Philistines marched up to confront him. When David heard about it, he marched out against them.

Now the <st data-num="06430" class="">Philistines</st> had <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> and <st data-num="06584" class="">raided</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="06010" class="">Valley</st> of <st data-num="07497" class="">Rephaim</st>.
David asked God, “Should I march up against the Philistines? Will you hand them over to me?” The Lord said to him, “March up! I will hand them over to you!”

So they <st data-num="05927" class="">marched</st> against <st data-num="01188" class="">Baal Perazim</st> and <st data-num="01732" class="">David</st> <st data-num="05221" class="">defeated</st> them <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st>. <st data-num="01732" class="">David</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “Using me as his <st data-num="03027" class="">instrument</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="06555" class="">burst out against</st> my <st data-num="0341" class="">enemies</st> like <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st> <st data-num="06556" class="">bursts out</st>.” <st data-num="05921 03651">So</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="08034 04725">place</st> is <st data-num="08034" class="">called</st> <st data-num="01188" class="">Baal Perazim</st>.<n id="2" />
The Philistines left their idols there, so David ordered that they be burned.
The Philistines again raided the valley.

So <st data-num="01732" class="">David</st> <st data-num="05750" class="">again</st> <st data-num="07592" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> what he should do.<n id="1" /> This time<n id="2" /> <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">told</st> him, “<st data-num="03808" class="">Don’t</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">march up</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> them; <st data-num="05437" class="">circle</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">around</st> them and <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> against <st data-num="01992" class="">them</st> <st data-num="04136" class="">in front of</st> the <st data-num="01057" class="">trees</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="01961" class="">When</st> you <st data-num="08085" class="">hear</st> the <st data-num="06963" class="">sound</st> of <st data-num="06807" class="">marching</st> in the <st data-num="07218" class="">tops</st> of the <st data-num="01057" class="">trees</st>, <st data-num="0227" class="">then</st> <st data-num="03318 04421">attack</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">For</st> at that moment <st data-num="0430">God</st> is <st data-num="03318" class="">going</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> you to <st data-num="05221" class="">strike down</st> the <st data-num="04264" class="">army</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="06430" class="">Philistines</st>.”
David did just as God commanded him, and they struck down the Philistine army from Gibeon to Gezer.
So David became famous in all the lands; the Lord caused all the nations to fear him.
